author: Nicb1, KillerKiwiJuice, MgMetal13, Crembels, zx0, MikeyH, Alpha2546, PRoeleert, wondible, Quitch, Stuart98, dom314, Elodea, Graushwein, CptConundrum
description: Adds an entirely new faction for use in skirmish and multiplayer. KNOWN ISSUES: Joining a Legion game without the client mod crashes the game. Attempting to spectate a Legion game after it has launched crashes the game.
